channel.title: Shops
channel.description:
Can Someone please help me, whenever players trade my shop NPCs they lose connection.
its saying this in my Console.
[code] D: Dominionscape[fatal] - exception E: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -100 E: at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16913) E: at client.packetProcess(client.java:15821) E: at client.process(client.java:15793) E: at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) E: at server.main(server.java:55) [/code]

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Dominionscape Dominionscape
item.description:
@Dominionscape wrote:

nooo thats whats coming up in my run.bat console, i dunno whats going on[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2008, 10:32:05 am[/size][hr]Guys please help youll get mod on my server!!!
